Name: Battle Of Worldviews
About the game: Battle Of Worldviews - 'real time strategy' in which you have to fight with friends or AI, while watching the resources, weather conditions and their development. Constantly explore and discover improvements for your units, actively extract missing resources, suddenly attack other players at night and victory will always be yours. Features: * The game develops and is being finalized. * Change of time of day and weather conditions. * Pleasant graphics. * Good soundtrack. * Multiplayer.
